  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable, Writeable, TaskAwareRequest
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusterHealthRequest, ClusterInfoRequest, ClusterSearchShardsRequest, ClusterStateRequest, GetAliasesRequest, GetIndexTemplatesRequest, GetPipelineRequest, GetRepositoriesRequest, GetSettingsRequest, GetStoredScriptRequest, IndicesExistsRequest, IndicesShardStoresRequest, PendingClusterTasksRequest, TypesExistsRequest

    public abstract class MasterNodeReadRequest<Request extends MasterNodeReadRequest<Request>>
extends MasterNodeRequest<Request>
    Base request for master based read operations that allows to read the cluster state from the local node if needed

      • local

        public final boolean local​()
        Return local information, do not retrieve the state from master node (default: false).
        Returns:
        true if local information is to be returned; false if information is to be retrieved from master node (default).
